# {{lb|zh|slang}} [[cool]]

===Usage notes===
Whilst English "cool" may be used in many different contexts, the Chinese {{zh-l|酷}} (and, by extension, {{lang|zh|酷斃}}) is usually only used to describe something fashionable.
